__e: She's going blind and I can't do anything about it, so, no, nothing about any of this is right.
I know you felt guilty about her being blind... and I know she is dead now.
My vision is so messed up. I'm terrified of going blind and hearing your voice and not being able to see your face.
I guess blind rage can do that to you.
She can't really be blind. It's just part of her character, right?
Because you've got your love-blinders on, But i don't think we can count on matt.
Just can't believe that mother was too blind to see it.
My Lord whatever I've done don't strike me blind for another couple of minutes.
Isn't it possible that your love for Joe has blinded you to the truth about him?
Or if she was blinded, Like you were in your vision.
One day you'll be blind like me!
But not one as crazy and blind as the one you just side-stepped.
But then-- If a woman is blind, she isn't fit to be a mother.
I'm not blind, I mean, isn't that why you approached me in the first place?
Hank, just because I'm blind doesn't mean I don't know what's going on in the world.
Light makes you blind for a moment, but then you see everything clearly again...
It's just... so like me to just be totally blinded by my concern for the two of you.
I have been blinded by my love for you, but now they have let me see.
